Comments_List: I learned which debates within comparative politics might be essential for my own research.

Professor Mares tends to move a bit quickly, so it was difficult to follow some of the initial sessions. However, once one gets acquainted with her speed one comes to realize how great she is as synthesizing information. Her presentation style is demanding, but not inaccessible.
Yes, I would. Everyone in political science should try to take a course with Professor Mares!
Yes, it was a very good overview of CP.
